name: nationalization
content:

the process of a government taking control of a business or industry: Nationalization of agriculture is on the government's agenda. The administration is considering a partial nationalization of some banks. See
nationalize
More examplesFewer examplesHis policy of nationalization alienated much of the population.He called for the nationalization of the electricity companies.They demanded the nationalization of the economy and of trade.
